actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration

official_title: To encourage the reporting of sexual assaults by protecting the privacy rights of victims.
short_title: Privacy Protection for Rape Victims Act of 1991

summary.text: Privacy Protection for Rape Victims Act of 1991 - Authorizes an individual, in a civil action, to obtain appropriate relief from any person who identifies, in a manner calculated to inform the general public, such individual as the alleged victim of a criminal sex offense. Limits the applicability of this Act to conduct that employs an instrumentality of, or is in, interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: Privacy Protection for Rape Victims Act of 1991
To encourage the reporting of sexual assaults by protecting the privacy rights of victims.
